p: Under Al-stress condition, the comparison of LB-04 vs. CK-04 groups (combined effects of Al stress and S. luteus inoculation on masson pine seedlings) showed 96 DEPs with 50 up-regulated and 46 down-regulated proteins in LB-04 ( Table S3). GO annotation ( Figure 1b) for these DEPs revealed that the proteins were associated with response to an organic substance, response to abiotic stimulus, and unfolded protein binding.
